news.content:
ðŸš¨ Presenting: the new Explorer UI for TF Grid 3.x!


The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/the-threefold-grid-3-x-explorer-ui/1536


Thanks to our farmer community for already connecting more than 100 nodes (across 16 countries) to testnet.


And to our testing community â€“ more than 1,400 contracts have been deployed since testnet launch! ðŸš€
news.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.

previous.title: TF Grid 2.3.0 is live!
previous.excerpt: The release introduces some improvements to the gridâ€™s stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. You can read more within!

next.title: All About ThreeFold Grid 3
next.excerpt: As the team is working hard on bringing ThreeFold Grid 3 to mainnet, we wanted to remind you of what's new and what's coming!
